definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[קשׁשׁ]] (√ of foll.; cf. Targum [[קְשַׁשׁ]] be old (orig. be dried up)?, Syr. qa4 be old; J Aram. [[קַשִּׁישׁ]] old; Palm. [[קשישא]] name of office, perh. elder; NH [[קַשׁ]] stubble, straw (Löw:p. 160), so Syr. qe4o0, Targum [[קַשָּׁא]] (Ex 15:7, Is 40:24); Ar. qa4=a is loan-word Frä:137).
